summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of S. Webster St. from 3rd Ave. S. to 5th Ave. S.; and certain other streets and avenues; by asphaltic paving; all in accordance with Comptroller's File Nos. 284893 and 284894 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode fo "Payment by Bonds".
